\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage{tikz-cd}

\begin{document}

% https://tikzcd.yichuanshen.de/#-iiQNVakgALRHS6eNhoDTCADkTNG+VZSHZnPOfMhXiFgTFXAoXCAA
\begin{tikzcd}
    Z \arrow[r, "g"] \arrow[d, "f"']                    & Y \arrow[d, "i_2"] \arrow[rdd, "p_2'", bend left]  &   \\
    X \arrow[r, "i_1"'] \arrow[rrd, "p_1'", bend right] & X\coprod_Z Y \arrow[rd, "\exists! \theta", dashed] &   \\
                                                        &                                                    & W
    \end{tikzcd}

\end{document}
